note.p: Career: Fellow of Merton College, Oxford (1866); Lee's Reader in Physics, Christ Church, Oxford (1869); Science Master, Clifton College, Bristol (1869); Lecturer in Physics, Guy's Hospital, London (1873-1906); Examiner in Natural Philosophy in the University of London; Professor of Physics, Royal Naval College, Greenwich (1873-1908)
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
N R Ingram, 'All that you can't leave behind' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 177-184
